item.title: Atari goes analog.
item.story: The famous pioneer in digital gaming, Atari Corp announced today that they would be investing heavily in analog technologies. Said the CEO - "It's a lovely day outside. Let's go toss a ball around.

item.title: No news is good news.
item.story: Nothing tragic to report. Nope. Nothing really going on much at all. And back to you Susan.
